containerDesc: Main layout container. All other elements should always be put inside this one unless you want them to be full width (hero unit, slider, jumbotron etc).
rowDesc: Contains and allows management of columns.
wellDesc: A simple container with inset effect.
dividerDesc: A horizontal line to separate content.
imageDesc: A simple image with changeable url.
responsiveVideoDesc: Video embed that will scale depending on screen size.
pageHeaderDesc: A simple shell for an h1 to space out and segment sections of content on a page. It can utilize small element, as well as most other components.
paragraphDesc: A simple paragraph of editable text.
markedTextDesc: Text highlighted due to its relevance.
definitionListDesc: Association list consisting of zero or more name-value groups.
blockqouteDesc: A section quoted from another source.
progressBarDesc: Provide up-to-date feedback on the progress of a workflow or action with simple yet flexible progress bar.
listGroupDesc: Flexible component to display lists of simple or complex items.
panelDesc: A simple panel box to put other components in.
inputFieldDesc: A text field for user input.
textAreaDesc: A text area for user input with multiple rows.
inputGroupDesc: Text field with an addon on either side.
formGroupDesc: A container for label and form item.
listItemDesc: A simple list item, that goes into a list.
unorderedListDesc: Unordered list consisting of list items.
